title: Was drummer Bill Ward a drug addict when he was with Black Sabbath? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes they all were. Cocaine n booze was the norm for ALL members, Tony, Geezer,Ozzy,and Bill. His addictions were the reason at least once Bill left the band or didn’t tour. On the 1978 album “Never say die”, the linear notes say we would like to thank the COKE cola company in California or something to that effect. Ozzy n Bill were the crazies of the band often being partners in crime. They all now are clean I THINK.
